doc.str: CONTENT PROCESSING DEVICE, METHOD, AND PROGRAM

The disclosed content processing device, method, and program make it easier to get an idea of the content of videos. A metadata extraction unit (22) extracts representative image information and other metadata from content supplied via a content input unit (21) and accumulates said metadata in a metadata database (24). An image feature-quantity extraction unit (23) extracts image feature quantities from the content and accumulates said image feature quantities in an image feature quantity database (25). The image feature-quantity extraction unit also extracts image feature quantities from a search image. A search unit (27) compares the image feature quantities for the search image with image feature quantities from the image feature quantity database (25) and identifies still images that are similar to the search image. An output unit (28) reads out content metadata and generates display data for a timeline display.
